title: Decouple Smite from Jungle Items
body: It's an archaic, out-of-date system that only serves to screw the auto-filled junglers that forget to pickup smite.

replies.body: Punish the system because the player doesn't pay attention...
That's not really a punishment of the system. That's more of a "This system is illogical."
Illogical because the player doesn't pay attention? That's what being said from what you put in your thread, unless you go into more detail on why it's illogical mate

ADCs would just love this idea: {{item:1416}} 

Basically riot tried that once and laners started abusing jungle items.
It was made that way so laners don't abuse the smitems without risking something for it.
